Package org.teamfarce.mirch.screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    Created by brookehatton on 31/01/2017.
    FindClueScreen
    This class displays a clue with its information when it has just been found
    InterviewScreen
    The InterviewScreen contains GUI for these GameStates: interviewStart, interviewQuestionStyle, interviewAccuse, interviewQuestion, interviewQuestionClue
    JournalScreen
    The journal screen draws the Journal GUI to the screen and handles any inputs whilst the journal is displayed
    MainMenuScreen
    The Main Menu screen draws the Main Menu GUI to the screen and handles any inputs whilst the Menu is displayed.
    MapScreen
    Created by brookehatton on 31/01/2017.
    NarratorScreen
    This is the screen which displays the narrator and a defined speech To show the screen with the defined speech you do the following Have access to the game object (MIRCH).
